body: Many half-orcs decorate themselves with tattoos, piercings, and ritual scarification, which they consider sacred markings. Half-orcs with this racial trait gain a +1 luck bonus on all saving throws. This racial trait replaces orc ferocity.
name: Sacred Tattoo
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Orcs/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Sacred Tattoo
